page.title: 10REV.I.FENTON,VICAR OF WITLEY
page.content: Rev.Fenton has been vicar of Witley since 19 October 1984. He has lived here since 25 September 1984.He has very little spare time.He has one day off a week,which is Tuesday.His annual holiday is four weeks and he has one week off after the busy times of Christmas and Easter.He has a very full day,which is recorded below. {Typical day of a vicar . Sunday. {7.00 }Get up. {12.00}Home {7.30 }Unlock Church {13.00}Dinner {8.00 }Service {14.30}Cut grass {9.00} Breakfast {16.45}Tea {9.30} Back to Church{17.30}Evensong {9.45} Service {18.30}Lock Church 'Lashams Lea' has been a vicarage since 13 September 1983 .It was Dr. Copeland's home before.The vicarage has 11 rooms.The vicar lives there with his wife and three children.
